name: Welcome to Hamsterton
description: This game was developed by Asif Khan (game design, programming, graphics) and Zhakhann (sound design and music) for Trijam #95, a game jam that challenges creators to make a game in 3 hours. The theme was "hamsters". I guess people really like hamsters. This game took longer than 3 hours per person (about 5 hours of dev and 4.5 hours for sound design).
